reviews.reviewText: Beautiful spa, welcoming staff, Bethany was amazing and a perfectionist .. my lips are AMAZING!! Thank you!
I love it  Bethany was the top notch in knowing Lip filler !! She the one to chose !! In the Atlanta area !! I am loving my new look!!
Only rating provided.
Great focus on client experience while also doing amazing work. It’s often hard to find both. The atmosphere is also very aesthetically appealing, not sterile or stuffy at all. Highly recommend.
Dr Bethany Struckmeyer is great to work with! Very informative and has the softest touch you can barely feel anything!
Bethany is just the nicest and best.  Give her a try.  Really explains all about botox, benefits, etc!!

They are incredible here. I was very nervous to get Botox for the first time and Bethany made me so comfortable and did an amazing job! She explained everything from start to finish and my results have made me more confident than I’ve ever been. I signed up for their membership and get my monthly facials with Ashley who is also incredible! Her personality is infectious and she has taught me so much about taking care of my skin. To say I highly recommend going to this place is an understatement. They will take great care of you :)
Amazing experience! Super clean and staff is very friendly and helpful. Can’t wait to go back!

I could not recommend balanced aesthetics Med spa enough!! I loved my first hydrafacial so much, that I opted in for the monthly membership. It’s something that I look forward to every month and Ashley always makes me feel so welcomed! You will not regret booking with them!
Went in for first time and had such an amazing experience! Ashley was so sweet and efficient. The whole experience overall was great and will definitely be going back!
Only rating provided.
Only rating provided.
Bethany was outstanding! Very knowledgeable, very kind, great energy! I’m new to Atlanta, thank goodness I found her!
Only rating provided.

Bethany was extremely helpful in explaining procedures and options just for me. I felt completely at ease during my very first Botox session!!  I would highly recommend her to anyone looking for new skin care options!

A wonderful clinic with very professional and welcoming staff. My experience was not only quick and painless, I was also impressed by the bedside manner of the professionals here. I will definitely be coming back!

Ashley has changed my skin game! She is so knowledgeable about skin care and what to do for preventative care,  couldn’t be happier to have found her. The staff here is also lovely, kind and accommodating making your experience really pleasant. Couldn’t recommend them more!
Only rating provided.

Started coming here after moving to Atlanta and honestly have loved it. They are super welcoming and very informative, putting up with all my questions and making me feel comfortable (still rather new to Botox). Definitely recommend!

Only rating provided.

The staff is always so great and friendly. They take time to explain procedures and recommend additional treatments or products that will enhance your current treatments tailored to you specifically. I’m back and forth from the west coast and I make sure to come in every time I’m back in Atlanta. They’re truly the best!
Only rating provided.
This place is amazing! Wonderful staff, services, and overall experience!

I have been a member of Balanced for the last year and it is the best thing I have done for my skin. As a frequent “med spa” jumper in the past, I have never felt more at home than at Balanced. I highly recommend for all your skincare and injectable needs. They’re so lovely, professional and competent. Do yourself a favor and book. And ask for Ashley Quinn SHE IS AMAZING

This is my favorite medspa and I’ll be going here till the day I die LOL. The staff is incredible, Ashley and Bethany are so sweet and so personable and really know their stuff. It feels less like an appointment and more like going to hangout with my friends. The office is conveniently located and clean and beautiful. 10/10 experience every time I go and I recommend it to everyone!
The staff are absolutely lovely. Had a great experience my first time visiting the clinic. I will be back every month.
Only rating provided.
Always an amazing experience! The staff are all so kind!
Love this place! The staff is super friendly and professional. Bethany is amazing with Botox and I looove getting my facials with Ashley. Best med spa in Atlanta!

The facility is very clean and staff members are extremely helpful and welcoming! I’m very satisfied with the service and will be recommending this med spa to all of my friends. I recently enrolled in their membership program and am excited to continue receiving future treatments here!!!
Ashley was amazing!! Really enjoyed my facial!
Only rating provided.

Awesome experience! Everyone was super sweet. Bethany was great at explaining different options for me, and she really wanted to get down to the bottom line before deciding on a treatment plan. It also didn’t even hurt when I got my blood drawn!! Highly recommend!
Only rating provided.
Exceptional service and great people! The experience was inviting and friendly. A MUST try 😊
Awesomely it’s all about experiences and today was a great one with you guys. 💪🏾 thank you
Bethany is the best!! I got Botox and lip filler for the first time with her and she was AMAZING! She is so kind and makes you feel so comfortable. Would absolutely recommend!

When it comes to your face, you should only go to someone you can trust implicitly. Kat has an extremely gentle technique, and I was highly impressed with her care. I bruise like a peach so I fully expected to wake up to some slight bruising on my face the morning following Botox treatment. I am beyond delighted to say that my face was 100% free from bruising and sensitivity! Kat is an absolute gem, and I look forward to seeing her again.

All in all, this was a very comfortable experience. From the waiting room, to the extensive consultation, and all the way through treatment.  Staff is professional, listens attentively, and follows through with top-notch care. I will definitely be returning to Balanced Aesthetics Medspa!
Had a great experience here from start to finish! Also shoutout to Bethany for making me feel super comfortable on my first time doing Botox!

Update: Initially left a positive review on my way out their door at their request, but I have to be honest so a revision is due.
Positives- Had a Groupon so it was cheap. Quick. Aesthetician was very sweet and personable, but not sure her level of experience. I thought I was originally acheduled with a PA. Negatives- Something was either wrong, or I was a baby about IPL, but she turned down the settings twice before it was tolerable. Never had a problem with unmanageable pain w/ other lasers for hair or skin & I have had many over the years. I used to work as a laser provider, got free treatments, & could tolerate whatever without numbing cream. But never had had IPL before. Well, a few days later after the IPL, I knew it wasn't just me being a wuss. I started having white and skin-colored papules and pustules on my forehead especially, where the pain had been THE worst. I was out of state at the time because I had to go to California for work for a few months, so I didn't go back. I thought maybe it was the climate change at 1st. But it persisted. Saw a derm there diagnosed it as sebaceous hyperplasia from the IPL, apparently a possible side effect I was not aware of, and can be a higher risk with certain machines or penetration of the light. Great. Well, it got worse for a while and looked like acne and milia -- not something you want at 48. I rode it out; no more lasers or anything fancy, just regular skin care & some low strength OTC retinoids. Now, 9 months later, the eruption is mostly just the flesh-tones papules and a few white ones, but it still hasn't returned to normal. And I never saw a improvement in my hyperpigmentation. Lose/lose. Word to the wise -- do your research, don't do Groupon for this kind of thing that can cause long-lasting skin changed. Would not recommend.

I’ve been to multiple med spas but this was the best experience by far! Bethany was super informative and answered all of my questions. She even put together a 6month plan to achieve safe, natural results. 10/10 recommend!!

I visited BA Med Spa for the first time last week. I am so incredibly happy that I have picked this Spa over any other, and am beyond satisfied with their services. I saw Bethany for my first lip filler ever, and she has been very knowledgeable, was super sweet and explained every step along the way. My lips look better than I ever imagined and I have gotten so many compliments on how natural the filler looks. All team members that I had interactions with, including Katie at the front desk, were so sweet and nice, and I felt welcomed and special to be part of their BamFam. I will sign up for their membership because I truly believe that BA Med Spa cares about their customers and contributes to making them more comfortable and happier! Can’t thank you enough and would absolutely recommend to anyone!

I loved everything about this place, from the clean environment to the friendliness of the employees. The aesthetician Ashely Quinn was fantastic. She was professional and knowledge about what she was doing. She made me feel right at home and comfortable while receiving my facial.
Only rating provided.
Only rating provided.
First time here - Bethany and staff are fantastic. Very friendly, patient and educational. Thank you!
They customer service is amazing. The energy is unmatched and love coming in to every appointment. Definitely recommend.
Only rating provided.
Only rating provided.

I have gone here several times and I am always treated like a queen. The staff is absolutely amazing!!  They take their time and they let you know exactly what you need, and they make sure you are totally happy with your results. I’ve been to a lot of Med spas, but I’ve never been anywhere as nice as this.  If you feel bad about yourself after you walk in, you will feel amazing when you walk out!! They can pretty much do anything you want and go above and beyond to help you!  I am on a limited budget, and they were still able to do everything I needed. You really need to check this place out!!  You will look and feel amazing when you leave! They have taken 5 years off my appearance after just one visit! I had Ashley do the hydra facial and micro needling. Then the next visit we discussed having micro needling and CO2 laser. I expect to look another five years younger after following Ashley's advice. Bethany is amazing with Botox you never even feel the injections and the results are so worth it. I love this place and can’t wait to go back!!
Everyone was so nice and helpful. They took the time to listen to what I wanted and create a plan that worked for me.
Only rating provided.
Great customer service! They have a passion for what they do and it shows!
Best Med Spa and only one I’ll go to now! Beautiful place, amazing people, and incredible service!
I have found a new home for my Aesthetics. Ashley is great.
Bethany was phenomenal! I was so comfortable the whole time. The office is very clean and everything is explained thoroughly!

I got a facial from Callahan Proctor and it was wonderful! I had not gotten a facial in a long time and Callahan explained everything in detail and also recommended products for my skin type. I highly recommend Callahan at Balanced Aesthetics Med Spa.

I went to this medspa in desparate need of a facial! I saw Callahan and she did an amazing job! She explained everything she was doing an what she chose specific to my skin in the process. She was super knowledgeable and very personable! Highly recommend this place as well as Callahan!
I absolutely loved Callahan, she was very sweet and professional!! Me and my husband will definitely be back❤️

Loved my first time visiting BA! Got Botox with Bethany and she took the time to answer my questions and map out where I’d benefit from treatment. This will be my new go to spot for all aesthetic needs!
Only rating provided.

From the second you walk into Balanced Aesthetics Med Spa you feel welcome and comfortable.  I saw Ashley Quinn for a hydra facial (my first hydra facial experience) and it did not disappoint! Ashley was very knowledgeable and answered every single one of my questions/addressed all of my skin concerns all the while making the experience relaxing and enjoyable. I was very impressed with my results and will definitely be back regularly.

I have nothing but positive feedback for this place! In every aspect this was THE best Medical Spa I’ve been to. From the moment you arrive, you’re greeted by friendly staff and offered water & coffee while you sign your paperwork. I went in for a hydra facial with Ashley Quinn, who walked me through every step of the facial and was incredibly informative.  She provided suggestions on how to up my skincare routine which I will be using!

Once I was done with my hydra facial, I had made the somewhat impulsive decision to pop my lip injection cherry, after seeing Bethany Struckmyere’s work on Instagram, prior to my arrival at Balanced Aesthetics Med Spa. Not only was Bethany incredibly knowledgeable, she was extremely comforting in her approach and explained the different filler options and provided her expertise on what would look good. Since this was my first time I had no idea what I “wanted” but Bethany was patient and incredibly understanding (almost like she read my mind with what I wanted!) I wanted something “natural” but noticeable and she did such an amazing job. I will 100% be returning not just for the incredible service but for the whole experience. Highly recommend a visit there.
Only rating provided.
Only rating provided.

I absolutely loved my experience at Balanced Aesthetics Medspa. I went in for a HydraFacial with Callahan and she was so wonderful. She knew everything about the products she was using and made me feel extremely comfortable before, during, and after the procedure. I was initially a little nervous about the procedure as it was one of my first experiences at a Medspa, but all of my nerves were quickly calmed by Callahan who made the experience that much more better. The location was extremely clean and I will be looking to return very soon as I loved my entire experience.
Only rating provided.
Only rating provided.
I came in for Botox and lip fillers, it was my first time for both. The staff made me feel SO comfortable and they did a perfect job! And they were so friendly. I will definitely be back :)
I had a great experience at Balanced Aesthetics!! The staff were all very kind and professional! Bethany did a great job on my Botox - I can’t wait to go back!

Bethany Struckmeyer, PA is by far the most delicate and distracting ( in a good way) injector I’ve been to in the 15 years I’ve experienced with any facial filler/Botox.   I have tried over 20 different people, through the years, so this is a bold and honest comment, not to mention an awesome experience!! The entire staff is amazing here. Ashley is amazing, too!! if you don’t love her instantly, you have issues they can’t fix here!!  You won’t regret making this drive!!  It could possibly change your life🙏🏻
Only rating provided.
Only rating provided.
Bethany is amazing. I would go  back only to her,       And I would recommend everyone to her. She has a magic hand and is soooo patient that nothing hurts. Will be back for more.
Only rating provided.
My very first time getting lip fillers and they were amazing! They made me feel super safe throughout the whole process. Can’t wait to be back!!

I’m a bug fan of BAM! The staff here is unbeatable. I have a membership (which I highly recommend you get) so I’m in once a week. I will say it’s nice to walk into a place where everyone knows your name and takes an interest in who you are. That is not what I expected when I signed up at a Med spa. You’re not getting the average here. You’re getting a very professional and customized experience that is sprinkled all over with happy friendly people. It’s not high pressure or a sterile environment, although it is very clean. If you’re feeling overwhelmed and not sure where to go for your skincare, or other medspa needs I highly recommend you visit the good people at BAM. They will take excellent care of you.

So Amazing…. Luv my results, luv the vibe
Luv the team

I had the hydrofacial by Callahan & Botox by Bethany today! Both were very professional, efficient, educating, & answered all of my concerns/questions. Excellent experience, highly recommend & they'll be my cosmetic/health go-to going forward 💁🏻‍♀️

My first interaction with Balanced Aesthetics was by following them on social media. They immediately sent me a message welcoming me and thanking me for the follow. Day of my appointment, Kara welcomed me as soon as I walked in and was so sweet! I got a hydra facial with Ashley and it was the best experience! She was so sweet, professional and knowledgeable. Answered all my questions and made great recommendations! I left with glowing skin. Can’t wait to try other services offered. Will definitely be back!

Bethany was amazing! I had lip fillers done. She made me feel so comfortable during the entire experience. I left feeling so great about my lips. She did a very good job asking me what my expectations were to achieve the results I wanted. They look so natural and beautiful!
Had the best experience at BA Med Spa, injections and laser hair removal. Everyone is so sweet and knowledgeable. 10/10 would recommend!
I had an amazing experience.  Bethany was awesome and kept me informed through the whole session. I love my results and will definitely be back.

I got a hydro facial from Callahan, and I have never been more confident or felt more heard about my skin concerns. She took the time to explain how everything works and the benefits it will have on my skin. My skin is glowing!!!! She set me up with all the products to maintain my progress until my next facial :). I have never experienced such genuine kindness and concern for everything I said! Highly recommend balanced aesthetics and Callahan for your next facial.

The whole office was so so nice and clean! The staff was welcoming and kind. The overall experience was amazing.
This location is great! The staff is amazing and very kind. Bethany is an angel and took care of all concerns!

Balanced aesthetics is the place to go! I went to Bethany for fillers and botox, and I am so happy with the results! The staff is loving and welcoming, and the office is gorgeous! I 100% recommend coming here.
Bethany was so incredibly knowledgeable and helpful!  Will definitely be back. ❤️
Love it here!!
Bethany was great and took her time to really understand what I wanted and carefully placed the filler in my desired place. Everyone was friendly and professional!
Such a cute space and a professional experience! Highly reccomend

Amazing experience getting a hydra facial with Ashley! The office is beautiful & the entire team is so professional and friendly.I will definitely be coming back!

Customer service was amazing! The front desk was friendly and the ambience and office was beautiful. Dr Lascala was knowledgeable and listen to me during our apt.I did not feel rushed and he was able to answer all of my questions. Great bedside manner and friendly demeanor
Bethany is amazing!

Amazing! I have had Botox and a hydrafacial here and have been so impressed with the results each time. Everyone that works here is so kind and pays the utmost attention to detail. I highly recommend visiting and trying anything they suggest for your skincare and aesthetic needs!

I went in for lip filler with Bethany and it was a great experience! She makes you feel so comfortable and explains the differences between the different types of possible lip fillers. I left the spa feeling great! Very happy with how she was so meticulous in filling my lips and they’re perfect. Would definitely recommend her and the spa!

I love being a member at Balanced Aesthetics! The entire team is so friendly and every visit is a great experience. When you walk in, you will be warmly greeted and have a moment to sit comfortably in the beautifully decorated lobby until it’s time for your appointment. I’ve been regularly seeing Ashley for facials for the past few months and my skin looks better than ever. She is extremely knowledgeable about products and will help you find a routine to stick to between visits that is best suited for your skin goals. Bethany is also fabulous for injectables. I am extremely pleased with the results of my Botox and lip filler. She is extremely knowledgeable about facial anatomy and filler placement. She discusses your desired result with you before you begin and does everything she can to achieve it during your visit. It’s always a treat to work with this team, and I look forward to my next appointment!
Only rating provided.
Got my facial done by Ashley Quinn, highly recommend her! She is so nice and my skin looks and feels amazing. Very good pricing here too, will definitely be back!

First experience here was great! Referred by Row House partnership and loved how clean and well run Balanced Aest is. Got the hydrofacial and left feeling refreshed!

These ladies made me feel so welcomed and special the moment I walked in! Bethany was very personable and knowledge about my filler procedure and made me feel comfortable and included in the process. Best of all, my results were phenomenal. Can’t recommend this place enough!

After trying other places and programs with no success, I found Dr. Lascala at Balanced Aesthetics and Medspa.  What a life changer!  He actually listened to my concerns and goals and put me on the right protocol to lose weight, gain muscle, restore my energy and so much more!!

He is so knowledgeable and takes the time to educate you throughout the entire process!  Remember goals aren't reached over night, but if you trust the process and stay the course you will see fantastic results!

They have so many great options to help you obtain your desired results!!  He is so great, I have recommended him to others who are now also getting the benefit of his expertise and knowledge!!!

Highly recommend!!!

My first-time experience at Balanced was absolutely fantastic! Emily was super informative and answered all of my many questions. The whole office staff was lovely and helpful. I will definitely be back!

I have gotten a few facials from the girls at Balanced Aesthetics Med Spa and have enjoyed it so much!!! I’m super stoked to start my membership there & have gorgeous skin year round :) literally cannot wait to branch out and try more of their services

Emily was so thorough and professional! She tailored to all of my needs and will definitely make future appointments with her in the future. All staff have been so friendly and get you in and out of their office in a timely manner! Love balanced aesthetics medspa!

After moving to Atlanta from LA, I’ve been searching for a Med Spa that checks all the boxes: products and treatments that work and an inviting atmosphere and staff. BAM is everything and more. I had a Hydro Facial with Ashley, and she and I hit it off from the very beginning. She is knowledgeable and passionate, and I can’t wait to book another appointment with her. She asked about my skin goals, and gave me direction about which of the various treatments at BAM I should choose. I left with glowing skin!

I went to see Bethany for my lip filler and it was my first time. She was absolutely amazing and so detail orientated. She walked me through the whole process, step by step and communicated everything about the procedure so well. She listened to my needs and used her expertise to give me the lips I’ve always wanted. Even right after, they looked amazing and I’m so excited. I highly recommend Bethany. 12/10 experience

I had such an amazing experience at Balance! I got the Laser Genesis done and Emily was super knowledgeable in absolutely everything. The owner was there and she was also so nice! Definitely coming back!
Loved my facial from Ashley, the experience was so nice I would recommend coming here for facials and Botox.

I have seen both Bethany (for lip injections) and Ashley (for facials) and they are both outstanding! So professional and knowledgeable and make you feel at home from the second you walk in until the second you leave.
LOVE Balanced Aesthetics with all my heart - amazing experience, amazing people. Beth is the absolute best injector, PA, human being. Go see her ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Great knowledge of lasers! John and Emily know their lasers well and will let you know what you need.

Ashley was amazing! Answered all my questions and did amazing service. The whole staff was so nice and made me feel comfortable from the moment I walked in.
The staff their is really friendly and nice helpful tips on skin care and great service I was happy
John is very comforting and experienced and put me at ease for my first micro needling experience! The girls at the front desk were also professional and helpful. Def recommend!

I came to balanced aesthetics for a tattoo removal consult. The waiting area is so cute and inviting & the staff is extremely friendly. I had a one hour appointment where we went over all the options, pricing, timeline and outcomes. I was very impressed with the knowledge of the staff and the treatment options. While the actually treatment was painful, the staff was so patient and accommodating. I really can’t recommend this place enough and I can’t wait to see my results!
Great place and staff! Loved my results.

They offer great, affordable services and have advanced technologies that I didn’t even know about! I feel like I’m in great hands with my aesthetician and look forward to making progress on my skin

Ashley is so personable and treats every guest like a princess. She makes your experience at Balanced Aesthetics such a calming and relaxing one...You will never want to leave! Ashley, along with the rest of the team, will make you feel so welcomed and at ease from the moment you walk in :)

So far I’ve done a mini hydrafacial with Ashley and an AMAZING laser/micro needling  treatment with Jon. Knowledgeable, professional, and so nice - can’t recommend enough and already have my next treatment scheduled!
I absolutely loved Bethany she was so nice, patient and informative and everything she said was true because I am in love with my lip fillers!

I had the greatest experience here the ladies that greet you when you come in make you feel like the know you already and let’s not talk about ginger the injector she has a very professional attitude and makes you feel so comfortable throughout the whole procedure I can’t wait to go back I love everything about this place and more
This place is great! From when you walk in to when leave everyone is wonderful! Bethany for injections and Ashely for facials are the perfect combo! Can’t wait to go back!

The staff is so professional  and willing to help meet your skincare goals. I saw Bethany who was so thoughtful and detailed in her approach.  I will be back for some more services to see how they can help me look my best in 2021 and beyond!
My new favorite spot! I’ve been seeing great results via IPL facial and everyone there is really friendly and helpful.
Bethany is the sweetest. Loved everyone there.
Great office staff - kind and knowledgeable.

Balanced Aesthetics MedSpa was an outstanding experience.  From the ease of booking my services to entering the extremely clean beautiful office, to being greeted with the warmest of welcome and assistance to my amazing facial-- I truly look forward to making this a regular part of my wellness routine and look forward to experiencing additional services from the amazing professionals at Balanced Aesthetics.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND

Amazing service highly recommend for any of your aesthetic needs, very friendly staff.
Beautiful office, excellent staff and great communication! You will not be disappointed
I loved my experience at Balanced Aesthetics! They really catered to me and what I personally needed to reach my goals. Seriously cannot wait to try their other services as well- they have it all!
Beautiful facility. Outstanding staff that's experienced and knowledgeable. I highly recommend you give them a try for all your cosmetic or hormone therapy needs, best I've felt in my life.

Went to my first appointment last week; their office is pristine, the staff is super professional, and the treatments are AMAZING! I had two treatments done that I’m already seeing positive results from and already planning times for 4 other treatments that I want. They really have everything you need. Definitely recommending them to all of my friends☺️

Got a micro-needling/laser procedure done to work on removing stretch marks and I’m so glad I decided to come here for such a sensitive procedure. Also, got my first hydra facial done here and now I’m hooked. My face not only looked clear and soft after but also for the week that followed. Staff is knowledgeable, dedicated and very kind! I will always choose Balanced Aesthetics for my skin care needs!
Only rating provided.

I absolutely loved my visit here! Clean, informative and cutting edge technology! The staff was great from start to finish! John and Elliot were very welcoming and walked my girlfriend and I through the entire visit with amazing recommendations. I love a place that you leave feeling confident, not only about yourself but your services as well.

I’ve been to a few different MedSpas on the East coast and this experience was by far my favorite!! The staff were friendly, professional, very educated, and made me feel comfortable during my visit. I received a health and hormonal consult, which gave me insight on issues I’ve been dealing with for quite some time now. I also received an incredible massage and the massage therapist was very cognizant of my areas of pain on my back. I struggle with chronic back pain and felt relief after the session. I will definitely be returning to Balanced Aesthetics MedSpa!

BLOWN AWAY by their expertise and care!!!

I first came to Balanced Aesthetics just for laser hair removal, after going to 2 different medical spas and having a negative experience. Balanced Aesthetics made me feel like family immediately. Their esthetician, Jon, is incredible and helped me not only do laser hair removal, but helped get rid of scars that I've had for years and was self-conscious about. The entire medical team is highly educated, and sat down with me to create a personalized health and wellness plan.

The location is very convenient and easy to find. Everyone was very nice and went above and beyond my expectations. I would highly recommend this medspa to anyone looking to learn more about optimizing their health.

name: Balanced Aesthetics Med Spa in 1800 Peachtree Road Northwest #855, Atlanta
